Fayetteville.Wiley P. McNair House:
The Wiley P. McNair House is a historic house located at 301 Mountain Street in Fayetteville, Arkansas.


== Description and history ==
It is a 2-1/2 story timber-framed structure, with a side gable roof and two projecting front gables. The left gable is atop a two-story projecting section, and there is a single-story shed-roof porch extending to the right.
